price: Nokorε sε (Zaquum) yε dua a efifi wͻ Amane-hunu gya no ase.
arabic: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٞ تَخۡرُجُ فِيٓ أَصۡلِ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: innahā shajaratun takhruju fī aṣli al-jaḥīmi
